selectButton(Button, boolean) - Method in class classes.Grid
Selects the indicated button and adjacent tiles that belong to the same piece.

Sets all possible moves for each piece in the grid.
setAttributes(String, int, int, int, Color, boolean) - Method in class classes.Button
Manually sets the attributes of this button: its tag, height, width, position in multi-tile piece, color, and whether this button is a blank tile.
setBlank(boolean) - Method in class classes.Button
Setter for boolean variable blank, which indicates whether or not this button is a blank tile in the grid.

setChecked(boolean) - Method in class classes.Grid.snapChar
 
setChildrenList(Node, Button[][]) - Method in class classes.Solutions
Runs through each piece of the grid, creates new grids based on each possible move that can be made from each piece, creates a snapshot of the grid, checks hash map that will be storing the Snapshots of there is one already made if not then it stores the snapshot along with the grid to the hashmap "SnapShotMap" to prevent creating loops when running through the breadth first search.
setDMoves(int[], int) - Method in class classes.Button
Sets the possible moves downwards.
setGridHashMap(String, Button[][]) - Method in class classes.Solutions
Sets a hash map for a grid using the grid's snapshot to set each piece's Tag in the grid as the key that maps to the given button.

Setter for this button's height.

showHint() - Method in class classes.Grid
Gets the shortest solution path and performs the first move in the resulting list of moves.
showSoln() - Method in class classes.Grid
Gets the shortest solution path and performs all the moves in the resulting list of moves by starting a TimerTask that performs one move per second.
